dsOverview.title: Global Monthly Surface Temperature Anomalies (1856-2005), Precipitation (1900-1998), and Sea Level Pressure (1873-2000) from the University of East Anglia Climatic Research Unit

summary.p: Some selected data, managed by a variety of people and projects within the Climatic Research Unit (CRU), University of East Anglia.
